突破性项目揭示了精神疾病患者大脑变化的非凡多样性一项突破性项目绘制了近 1,300 名被诊断患有六种不同类型精神疾病的人的大脑变化，揭示了患有重度抑郁症和精神分裂症等疾病的人大脑变化的非凡多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Breakthrough-project-reveals-extraordinary-diversity-of-brain-changes-in-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Breakthrough-project-reveals-extraordinary-diversity-of-brain-changes-in-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312755fe-7508-4f93-b4b0-43bd2dc2ccb3 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:12:00 -0400 Breakthrough project reveals extraordinary diversity of brain changes in people with mental illnesses
